{"id":626935195,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1643047831,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/626935195/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"/*\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\n--||author : codechaser||-- \n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\n*/\nclass Solution\n{\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x)\n    {\n        bool negative = false;\n        if (x < 0)\n            negative = true;\n\n        if (x == 0 || x == INT_MIN)\n        {\n            return 0;\n        }\n\n        x = abs(x);\n\n        int ans = 0;\n        int digits = floor(log10(x)) + 1;\n        int multi = pow(10, digits - 1);\n\n        bool ok = false;\n        while (x)\n        {\n            if (digits == 10 && ok == false)\n            {\n                int max = INT_MAX;\n                max = max / (multi);\n                int temp = max % 10;\n                if (x % 10 > temp && ok == false)\n                {\n                    return 0;\n                }\n                else if (x % 10 < temp)\n                {\n                    ok = true;\n                }\n            }\n            ans += multi * (x % 10);\n            multi /= 10;\n            x /= 10;\n        }\n        if (negative)\n            ans *= -1;\n        return ans;\n    }\n};\n////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n/*\n    |---------------------------------------------------|\n    |||   https://codeforces.com/profile/codechaser   |||\n    |||   https://www.codechef.com/users/codechaser   |||\n    |||        https://github.com/code-chaser         |||\n    |---------------------------------------------------|\n*/\n////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer"}
